kizuna_health_a_01:
Hey there! Come on in! Everyone’s welcome in
the nurse’s office![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_02:
What brings you here today? I don’t see anything
super wrong with you or your Pokémon...[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_03: Wait...this is your first time here, isn’t it?[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_04a: Ohhh, so I guess you transferred in recently.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_04b:
Don’t be silly. I know I haven’t seen you before.
You can’t fool me that easily![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You must be [VAR TRNAME(0000)], right?
Everybody’s\r
been\r
talking\r
about you![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_06:
I’ve heard all kinds of rumors. Apparently you fell
off a cliff right after enrolling in the academy?\r
And even picked a fight with Team Star?[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_07:
Oh yeah! You’ve started your Treasure Hunt
thing, right?[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_08:
Come tell me about anything super interesting
you find out there in your adventures![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_09:
I’m kinda bored just sitting in here all day,
y’know? I don’t have any classes to teach,\r
and students only come here to skip class...[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_10: Sooo yeah, drop by if you can. Deal? Deal![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_a_system_01: You became slightly closer with Nurse Miriam!
